meanings.sent1: The old man was edentulous and had to eat soft foods.
meanings.sent2: The edentulous patient needed dentures to help with chewing.
meanings.sent3: The edentulous cat tried to chew on a carrot but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: The edentulous smile of the elderly lady was a stark reminder of aging.
meanings.sent5: The edentulous jawbone looked like a smooth, empty canvas.

meanings.sent1: The edentulous baby gummed on a teething toy.
meanings.sent2: The edentulous horse relied on a special diet of soft hay.
meanings.sent3: The edentulous pirate struggled to eat his favorite hardtack.
meanings.sent4: The edentulous shark's bite was surprisingly gentle.
meanings.sent5: The edentulous smile of the elderly man was endearing and toothless.
